sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 结论卵巢切除后，胫骨骨折愈合缓慢。

sentences.english: The X-ray lms showed the tibial intercondylar eminence displaced fracture.
sentences.chinese: X线片示胫骨髁间隆突撕脱骨折移位。

sentences.english: Conclusion Sliding graft was a safe and effective method in treating traumatic tibia nonunion.
sentences.chinese: 结论滑动植骨是治疗创伤后胫骨干骨不连的有效方法。

sentences.english: Left tibiae remained untreated as control.
sentences.chinese: 左侧胫骨未作手术为正常对照。

sentences.english: The role of tibia variables of Macaca mulatta in the Taihang Mountains in the sex determination was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究成年太行山猕猴胫骨变量在性别判别中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of steel wire fixation in treating the avulsion fracture of the tibial intercondylar eminence.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胫骨髁间隆突撕脱性骨折的临床治疗效果。

sentences.english: Methods 107 cases of open tibia fracture were treated with compressive external fixation.
sentences.chinese: 方法107例胫骨开放性骨折骨外固定加压治疗。

sentences.english: Is femur head lower part tibial of fracture restore?
sentences.chinese: 股骨头下方胫骨骨折的恢复？

sentences.english: Make sure each shinbone is exactly balancing over its heel.
sentences.chinese: 确保每个胫骨和它的对应的脚跟是平衡的。

sentences.english: Last, the anterolateral segment is internally rotated and reduced to the remaining distal tibia.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对胫骨远端剩余的前外侧骨块进行内旋，复位。

sentences.english: To investigate the causes and treatment of complications of open tibial fractures.
sentences.chinese: 探讨开放性胫骨骨折并发症的形成原因和处理方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the treatment method of severe tibial plateau fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨严重的胫骨平台骨折的治疗方法。

sentences.english: When you lift your foot, you are using your same-side shinbone as a long lever.
sentences.chinese: 当你的脚被拉高时，胫骨就变成了一个长长的杠杆。

sentences.english: Most of the stems' designs are based on anatomic data from Western populations.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的胫骨柄是基于西方人群的解剖数据而设计的。

sentences.english: Conclusions The tibialis anterior muscle and deep fascia flaps possess regular vasa vasorum and abundant vascularity.
sentences.chinese: 结论胫骨前肌肌筋膜瓣解剖血管恒定，血运丰富。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the prevention and treatment of the complications in proximal tibial osteotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胫骨上端截骨延长术的并发症及其防治。

definition: ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
